Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Wizard.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Board is the board you are given in the beginning and belongs only to you

    • getStudentsFromTable

      public Collection<Student> getStudentsFromTable(Color c) throws ExceptionGame
      This method returns the table of Student of the color passed as parameter, if there is no correspondence between the color passed and the tables of students of the board, the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      c - is the color
      Returns:
      the collection of students in the table of the parameter color
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown when there is no correspondence between the color and the tables of the board

      public Professor removeProfessorFromTable(Color c) throws ExceptionGame
      This method remove the professor of color passed as parameter if present, otherwise it returns an exception
      Parameters:
      c - is the color
      Returns:
      the professor just removed
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if the professor is not present
